name: How to Program in HTML
description:
Step 1: Turn on your computer.
Step 2: Open a webpage that teaches you HTML.
Step 3: Learn HTML and design a webpage.

name: How to Program in JavaScript
description:
Step 1: Make sure to have a box of tissues nearby.
 Step 2: Prepare yourself mentally through 20 years of meditation with Tibetan monks.
Step 3: Do not attempt to program in JavaScript.

name: This is a Seeded Article
description: This article is just a seed sent to the database to fill in a blank spot on the webpage. You may safely ignore this article.
